item.title: Cloud Native vs Cloud Agnostic: Weighing the Trade-Offs ðŸ¤œ ðŸ¤›
item.description: Background Speed â€‹â€‹is an important factor for business in this era when customers are looking for instant gratification. If the fact doesn’t convince you, the statistics might. An element as simple as a website’s load time carries weight. Statistics indicate that the first five seconds of a page load time have the greatest impact on conversion rates. So when consumer behavior has the greatest impact, it is profitable in the long run to modernize a business model accordingly.
